name: nitrile-preview
description: A preview of LATEX document generated from Markdown.

liveUpdate.description: Set it to true if you want the preview to be updated whenever source editor editor has been modified. Set to false if you only want the preview to be updated when the content is saved.

autoScroll.description: Set it to true if you want the preview to scroll to the highlighted part whenever it refreshes.

grammars.description: List of scopes for languages for which previewing is enabled. See [this README](https://github.com/atom/spell-check#spell-check-package-) for more information on finding the correct scope for a specific language.
